SEARCH
Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.particle

Class ParticleBuilder

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.particle.ParticleBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlockBreakParticleBuilder, ColoredParticleBuilder, ItemBreakParticleBuilder, VibrationParticleBuilder
public class ParticleBuilder extends Object
Allows displaying particles.
Mainly used for "special" particles, such as
invalid reference 
Particle#BLOCK_DUST
or
invalid reference 
Particle#SPELL_MOB
.
See Also:
  • normal(Particle)
  • redstoneDust(Color, int)
  • blockBreak(Material)
  • blockDust(Material)
  • mobSpell(Color, boolean)
  • itemBreak(ItemStack)
